response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that its true worth may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $850,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its market value. I believe that this price reflects the quality and potential of the product, while also allowing you to secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 850000}
